gamehongo.subtitle: The best way to learn a language is by actively using it.
gamehongo.description: In GameHongo, you can discover games and channels that match your current Japanese level. The website features a list-like system where users can rate the difficulty of the language used in games and videos.
gamehongo.care-experience: Great care was taken to ensure a smooth and intuitive user experience, including:
gamehongo.redis: Utilizing Redis for caching common searches
gamehongo.optimistic: Implementing optimistic updates for all information edits
gamehongo.ssr: Supporting server-side or static rendering for pages

amdocs.title: Fullstack Developer Amdocs
amdocs.introduction: While at Amdocs, I participated as a full-stack developer in the development of a web tool for creating telephony packages for Oi Company.
amdocs.main-task: I contributed to the improvement of the Spring Boot Java server, managed the OracleSQL database, and created new pages using HTML/jQuery.
amdocs.other-tasks: Additionally, I developed a bash tool for converting GitLab commits to ClearCase, greatly enhancing the speed of building new releases.

cookies.title: Whimsy Cookie Workshop
cookies.subtitle: The Handmaid Cookies of Sanca
cookies.introduction: An one page website for a cookie restaurant. The entire website was design with an cool vibe. It was utilized a lot of smooth animation with Framer Motion and an multi-color pallete.

hero-ai.title: Hero Creation AI
hero-ai.subtitle: Create your Super Hero with just one click
hero-ai.description:
In this website you can quickly create a new hero with AI generated image and backstory.
The project was utilized to polish my front-end and design skills.
hero-ai.challenges: I encountered a significant challenge related to the time-consuming nature of AI generation. To address this issue, I implemented the following measures:
hero-ai.paralalized: Parallelizing the backstory and image generation processes.
hero-ai.loading-bar: Incorporating a spinning wheel and loading bar to enhance user experience and provide real-time feedback.
